comments:
Description:
Old design file contain stock chart can not be opened correctly and exception is thrown out when be previewed.
 
Build number:
2.2.0.v20061128-0710
 
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached design file and preview.
 
Expected result:
1. The design file can be opened correctly.
2. No exception is thrown out.
 
Actual result:
1. The design file can not be opened correctly.
2. Exception is thrown out.
 
Error log:
Chart NewChart: 
- Data point label position Outside is not supported when rendering on a stock series. Allowed values are ABOVE, BELOW, LEFT and RIGHT. 
exception.illegal.datapoint.position.stock ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException: Data point label position Outside is not supported when rendering on a stock series. Created an attachment (id=54606)
old design file
The exception seems that chart did some changes and this error appeared. Assign chart team to investigate.

silently revert to ABOVE if unsupported position and log an error. This will 
ensure we keep backward compatibility with old designs

For compatibility with old model, only log the error and do nothing when rendering the invalid data point label of stock series. 
In the chart builder, select the first position type and update the model when opening the pop-up of data point label.

traces.message: Data point label position Outside is not supported when rendering on a stock series. Allowed values are ABOVE, BELOW, LEFT and RIGHT.
